engChrName: Still not sure you should've come along for the ride, Agnès.
engSearchText:
Still not sure you should've come along for the
ride, Agnès.
jpnChrName: ──しかし、お前まで来るのは 正直想定外だったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
──しかし、お前まで来るのは
正直想定外だったんだが。

engChrName: I know you've got three days off, but the new term started, didn't it? What, you got no work to do?
engSearchText:
I know you've got three days off, but the new term
started, didn't it? What, you got no work to do?
jpnChrName: いくら三連休だからって 新学期も始まってるんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
いくら三連休だからって
新学期も始まってるんだろうが？

engChrName: I just didn't want to be the only one left out.
engSearchText: I just didn't want to be the only one left out.
jpnChrName: で、でも私だけ仲間外れなんて 寂しいですし……
jpnSearchText:
で、でも私だけ仲間外れなんて
寂しいですし……

engChrName: The Geneses seem to be involved in this somehow, too, so it could be there's a role here that only I can play.
engSearchText:
The Geneses seem to be involved in this somehow,
too, so it could be there's a role here that only I
can play.
jpnChrName: それにゲネシスの件がある以上、 何かお役に立てるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
それにゲネシスの件がある以上、
何かお役に立てるかもしれません。

engChrName: And I applied for permission to be off campus for a few days last night, so don't worry—I'm not breaking any rules!
engSearchText:
And I applied for permission to be off campus for a
few days last night, so don't worry—I'm not breaking
any rules!
jpnChrName: 昨日の夜、外泊許可も申請できましたし どうかご安心くださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
昨日の夜、外泊許可も申請できましたし
どうかご安心くださいっ！

engChrName: You thought this through WAY too hard!
engSearchText: You thought this through WAY too hard!
jpnChrName: って、手回し良すぎだろ！？
jpnSearchText: <C5>って、手回し良すぎだろ！？

engChrName: ...Aramis has always been way too lax with rules for such a big-name academy.
engSearchText:
...Aramis has always been way too lax with rules for
such a big-name academy.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、名門校のクセに 相変わらず緩すぎるっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、名門校のクセに
相変わらず緩すぎるっつーか……

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: Umm... So if you're going to such a famous academy, why are you working for Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText:
Umm... So if you're going to such a famous academy,
why are you working for Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: えと、アニエスさんは共和国でも 有名な学校に通ってるそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
えと、アニエスさんは共和国でも
有名な学校に通ってるそうですが……

engChrName: Is it a part-time job?
engSearchText: Is it a part-time job?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の事務所には “ばいと”で働いてるんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様の事務所には
“ばいと”で働いてるんですよね？

engChrName: That's right. I've only just started, though.
engSearchText: That's right. I've only just started, though.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、はい。 お手伝いを始めたばかりですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、はい。
お手伝いを始めたばかりですけど。

engChrName: And I didn't have much say in the matter.
engSearchText: And I didn't have much say in the matter.
jpnChrName: ま、完全に押しかけだがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、完全に押しかけだがな。

engChrName: Oh, and Ferida—'Van' is fine.
engSearchText: Oh, and Ferida—'Van' is fine.
jpnChrName: ──ところでフェリーダ。 そろそろ“様”ってのはやめてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
──ところでフェリーダ。
そろそろ“様”ってのはやめてくれ。

engChrName: I'm gettin' paid for this, so you're my client. No need to be polite.
engSearchText:
I'm gettin' paid for this, so you're my client. No need
to be polite.
jpnChrName: 依頼料を払う以上、お前さんは客だ。 こちらにへりくだる必要はねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼料を払う以上、お前さんは客だ。
こちらにへりくだる必要はねぇ。

engChrName: B-But...
engSearchText: B-But...
jpnChrName: ふえっ……で、でも。
jpnSearchText: ふえっ……で、でも。

engChrName: ...Okay. But only if you call me 'Feri.'
engSearchText: ...Okay. But only if you call me 'Feri.'
jpnChrName: ……それじゃあヴァンさんで。 わたしもフェリでお願いしますっ。
jpnSearchText:
……それじゃあヴァンさんで。
わたしもフェリでお願いしますっ。

engChrName: Hmm? Sure. If that works for you.
engSearchText: Hmm? Sure. If that works for you.
jpnChrName: はん……？ ま、別にいいけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
はん……？
ま、別にいいけどよ。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: クスクス……
jpnSearchText: クスクス……

engChrName: If you're thirteen, then you must attend Sunday School at the temple, right?
engSearchText:
If you're thirteen, then you must attend Sunday
School at the temple, right?
jpnChrName: ──フェリちゃんは１３歳でしたか。 そうすると、七耀寺院の日曜学校に？
jpnSearchText:
──フェリちゃんは１３歳でしたか。
そうすると、七耀寺院の日曜学校に？

engChrName: Yeah. I started senior classes this year. They're a lot harder than what I'm used to...
engSearchText:
Yeah. I started senior classes this year. They're a lot
harder than what I'm used to...
jpnChrName: はい、今年から高学年に上がって 授業も難しくなっちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
はい、今年から高学年に上がって
授業も難しくなっちゃって……

engChrName: Oh, but the temples here aren't the same as the ones I know, I think?
engSearchText:
Oh, but the temples here aren't the same as the ones I
know, I think?
jpnChrName: そういえば共和国って“寺院”も わたしたちとは少し違うんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば共和国って“寺院”も
わたしたちとは少し違うんですよね？

engChrName: That's right. We have churches and chapels instead, though they serve the same purpose.
engSearchText:
That's right. We have churches and chapels instead,
though they serve the same purpose.
jpnChrName: ええ、教会や礼拝堂ですね。 女神様にお参りするのは同じですけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、教会や礼拝堂ですね。
女神様にお参りするのは同じですけど。

engChrName: But there ARE temples for worship in Calvard, too.
engSearchText: But there ARE temples for worship in Calvard, too.
jpnChrName: あ、でも中東式の寺院もありますよ？
jpnSearchText: あ、でも中東式の寺院もありますよ？

engChrName: You got Arusha, the Winged Goddess, in the Central East, and Aidios, the Sky Goddess, in the West.
engSearchText:
You got Arusha, the Winged Goddess, in the Central
East, and Aidios, the Sky Goddess, in the West.
jpnChrName: 《空の女神（エイドス）》に《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》──
jpnSearchText: 《空の女神（エイドス）》に《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》──

engChrName: They're believed to be one and the same even if the names're different, though.
engSearchText:
They're believed to be one and the same even if the
names're different, though.
jpnChrName: 大陸西部と中東部で呼び方は違うが 七耀教会じゃ同一存在とされているな。
jpnSearchText:
大陸西部と中東部で呼び方は違うが
七耀教会じゃ同一存在とされているな。

engChrName: She's even got another name if you go farther east.
engSearchText: She's even got another name if you go farther east.
jpnChrName: ちなみに東方はまた別の呼び方だ。
jpnSearchText: ちなみに東方はまた別の呼び方だ。

engChrName: Oh! Yeah! Aida told me about that!
engSearchText: Oh! Yeah! Aida told me about that!
jpnChrName: あ、それもアイーダさんに 聞いたことがあるような……！
jpnSearchText:
あ、それもアイーダさんに
聞いたことがあるような……！

engChrName: It feels like there's so much out there for me to learn...
engSearchText: It feels like there's so much out there for me to learn...
jpnChrName: うーん…… なんだか色々と新鮮です。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……
なんだか色々と新鮮です。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: Still, it sounds like Aida taught you a lot.
engSearchText: Still, it sounds like Aida taught you a lot.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんは本当に色々と アイーダさんに教わってるんですね？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんは本当に色々と
アイーダさんに教わってるんですね？

engChrName: She did. Not just about fighting, but about different places across the continent, what's popular in those places...
engSearchText:
She did. Not just about fighting, but about different
places across the continent, what's popular in
those places...
jpnChrName: はい……戦場での知識以外にも 流行とか、各地の事とか、たくさん。
jpnSearchText:
はい……戦場での知識以外にも
流行とか、各地の事とか、たくさん。

engChrName: I know this'll sound weird after I've already asked you to find her...
engSearchText:
I know this'll sound weird after I've already asked you
to find her...
jpnChrName: ──お願いしておいて 今さらかもしれませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
──お願いしておいて
今さらかもしれませんけど……

engChrName: ...but I still can't believe her corps would just disappear the way it did.
engSearchText:
...but I still can't believe her corps would just
disappear the way it did.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの隊が行方不明なんて わたし、信じられないんです。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの隊が行方不明なんて
わたし、信じられないんです。

engChrName: They're all hardened jaegers who have always been able to handle anything thrown their way.
engSearchText:
They're all hardened jaegers who have always been
able to handle anything thrown their way.
jpnChrName: 百戦錬磨の猟兵……何があっても 絶対切り抜けられると思いますから。
jpnSearchText:
百戦錬磨の猟兵……何があっても
絶対切り抜けられると思いますから。

engChrName: Your friend from the CID called her the Flameeater, didn't he?
engSearchText:
Your friend from the CID called her the Flameeater,
didn't he?
jpnChrName: そうですか……あの分析官の方に 《火喰鳥》と呼ばれていましたね？
jpnSearchText:
そうですか……あの分析官の方に
《火喰鳥》と呼ばれていましたね？

engChrName: Yeah. Pretty well-known name among jaegers.
engSearchText: Yeah. Pretty well-known name among jaegers.
jpnChrName: その筋じゃ有名な二つ名だな。
jpnSearchText: その筋じゃ有名な二つ名だな。

engChrName: They say she uses surgical precision with knives and gunfire to cut through enemy morale and momentum.
engSearchText:
They say she uses surgical precision with knives and
gunfire to cut through enemy morale and momentum.
jpnChrName: 敵部隊の攻勢や高まった士気を 的確に挫く銃撃に、断ち切るナイフ──
jpnSearchText:
敵部隊の攻勢や高まった士気を
的確に挫く銃撃に、断ち切るナイフ──

engChrName: She joined Eisenschild five years ago after her old corps disbanded, I think?
engSearchText:
She joined Eisenschild five years ago after her old
corps disbanded, I think?
jpnChrName: アイゼンシルトに移籍したのは ５年くらい前だったか？
jpnSearchText:
アイゼンシルトに移籍したのは
５年くらい前だったか？

engChrName: That sounds about right.
engSearchText: That sounds about right.
jpnChrName: はい……そう聞いています。
jpnSearchText: はい……そう聞いています。

engChrName: She was in another corps?
engSearchText: She was in another corps?
jpnChrName: ということは…… それまでは別の猟兵団に？
jpnSearchText:
ということは……
それまでは別の猟兵団に？

engChrName: She was! A really famous one, too.
engSearchText: She was! A really famous one, too.
jpnChrName: ──そうなんです！ 伝説的な団があって……！
jpnSearchText:
──そうなんです！
伝説的な団があって……！

engChrName: It was called Zephyr and was one of the two biggest jaeger corps in the West.
engSearchText:
It was called Zephyr and was one of the two biggest
jaeger corps in the West.
jpnChrName: 《西風の旅団》──人数は少ないけど 大陸西部で“双璧”と言われた団で……
jpnSearchText:
《西風の旅団》──人数は少ないけど
大陸西部で“双璧”と言われた団で……

engChrName: It was made up of a small number of combat specialists, the Jaeger King being its head.
engSearchText:
It was made up of a small number of combat
specialists, the Jaeger King being its head.
jpnChrName: 《王》っていう人に率いられた スペシャリストの集まりだったそうです。
jpnSearchText:
《王》っていう人に率いられた
スペシャリストの集まりだったそうです。

engChrName: And Aida used to lead one of their units.
engSearchText: And Aida used to lead one of their units.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんはそこの部隊長として ずっと活躍してきたそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんはそこの部隊長として
ずっと活躍してきたそうですけど……

engChrName: But after the Jaeger King died five years ago, the whole corps fell apart.
engSearchText:
But after the Jaeger King died five years ago, the
whole corps fell apart.
jpnChrName: ５年前、その団長さんが亡くなって 団がいったん解散してしまって……
jpnSearchText:
５年前、その団長さんが亡くなって
団がいったん解散してしまって……

engChrName: That was when she moved on to Eisenschild.
engSearchText: That was when she moved on to Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: それで今所属している アイゼンシルトに移ったそうです。
jpnSearchText:
それで今所属している
アイゼンシルトに移ったそうです。

engChrName: This is all so interesting... I didn't realize jaeger corps could have such a rich history.
engSearchText:
This is all so interesting... I didn't realize jaeger corps
could have such a rich history.
jpnChrName: 《西風の旅団》…… そんな猟兵団もあるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
《西風の旅団》……
そんな猟兵団もあるんですね。

engChrName: Zephyr's still around, by the way—just in a different form.
engSearchText:
Zephyr's still around, by the way—just in a
different form.
jpnChrName: ま、形を変えて 今も存続はしてるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、形を変えて
今も存続はしてるみたいだが。

engChrName: But yeah, their rep back in the day was somethin' else.
engSearchText: But yeah, their rep back in the day was somethin' else.
jpnChrName: ──確かにもう一方の双璧と並んで、 大陸西部最強と謳われた団だ。
jpnSearchText:
──確かにもう一方の双璧と並んで、
大陸西部最強と謳われた団だ。

engChrName: I can't see someone who used to be with 'em going down easily.
engSearchText:
I can't see someone who used to be with 'em going
down easily.
jpnChrName: その元メンバーが率いる部隊なら どんな相手にも後れは取らねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
その元メンバーが率いる部隊なら
どんな相手にも後れは取らねぇだろう。

engChrName: So you think so, too?
engSearchText: So you think so, too?
jpnChrName: や、やっぱりそうですよねっ……？
jpnSearchText: や、やっぱりそうですよねっ……？

engChrName: But if she's fine, then why hasn't she made contact with the rest of her corps?
engSearchText:
But if she's fine, then why hasn't she made contact
with the rest of her corps?
jpnChrName: でも、だったらアイーダさん、 どうして本隊に連絡もしないで……
jpnSearchText:
でも、だったらアイーダさん、
どうして本隊に連絡もしないで……

engChrName: Ugh... All of this is making my head hurt.
engSearchText: Ugh... All of this is making my head hurt.
jpnChrName: ……ああもう…… 頭がこんがらがっちゃいそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……ああもう……
頭がこんがらがっちゃいそうです。

engChrName: D-Don't worry! We'll find her for you.
engSearchText: D-Don't worry! We'll find her for you.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですよ。 きっと見つかりますから。
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫ですよ。
きっと見つかりますから。

engChrName: Even if she isn't in Creil, I'm sure we'll find some clue that will take us to her.
engSearchText:
Even if she isn't in Creil, I'm sure we'll find some clue
that will take us to her.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村にいるかどうかはともかく、 きっと手がかりはある筈です。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村にいるかどうかはともかく、
きっと手がかりはある筈です。

engChrName: You told us how deep your bond with her goes...
engSearchText: You told us how deep your bond with her goes...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、アイーダさんから 色々なことを教わったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、アイーダさんから
色々なことを教わったんですよね？

engChrName: That alone will surely draw the two of you back together.
engSearchText:
That alone will surely draw the two of you
back together.
jpnChrName: 知識や想いはきっと、大切な絆を たぐり寄せる手がかりになると思います。
jpnSearchText:
知識や想いはきっと、大切な絆を
たぐり寄せる手がかりになると思います。

engChrName: Where there's a will, there's a way—and Van and I have the will to find you a way!
engSearchText:
Where there's a will, there's a way—and Van and I
have the will to find you a way!
jpnChrName: だから大丈夫──ヴァンさんは勿論、 私も微力ながらお手伝いしますから！
jpnSearchText:
だから大丈夫──ヴァンさんは勿論、
私も微力ながらお手伝いしますから！

engChrName: You mean it...?
engSearchText: You mean it...?
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Well, thank you! I'll be counting on you both!
engSearchText: Well, thank you! I'll be counting on you both!
jpnChrName: はいっ、ありがとうございます……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、ありがとうございます……！

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: (Thinkin' about it, I might've had some indirect involvement with Aida two years back.)
engSearchText:
(Thinkin' about it, I might've had some indirect
involvement with Aida two years back.)
jpnChrName: （《火喰鳥》アイーダ…… ２年前に間接的に絡んでたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（《火喰鳥》アイーダ……
２年前に間接的に絡んでたな。）

engChrName: (She chose to go against her old home and help our side back then.)
engSearchText:
(She chose to go against her old home and help our
side back then.)
jpnChrName: （古巣とはあえて距離を置いて   協力してくれたらしいが……）
jpnSearchText:
（古巣とはあえて距離を置いて
協力してくれたらしいが……）

engChrName: (It makes no sense that someone of her skill would up and vanish. And with a Genesis maybe involved...)
engSearchText:
(It makes no sense that someone of her skill would up
and vanish. And with a Genesis maybe involved...)
jpnChrName: （……それだけの手練れが消息不明、   しかも《遺産》が絡んでるときたか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……それだけの手練れが消息不明、
しかも《遺産》が絡んでるときたか。）

engChrName: (There's gotta be more to this than there seems.)
engSearchText: (There's gotta be more to this than there seems.)
jpnChrName: （間違いなく何かあるだろうが……）
jpnSearchText: （間違いなく何かあるだろうが……）

engChrName: (The only question's whether she went dark by her own volition...)
engSearchText:
(The only question's whether she went dark by her
own volition...)
jpnChrName: （──問題は、消息を絶ったのが 自分の意志かそうじゃないか、だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（──問題は、消息を絶ったのが
自分の意志かそうじゃないか、だな。）

engChrName: *yaaawn*... Sorry. Didn't mean to yawn so loud.
engSearchText: *yaaawn*... Sorry. Didn't mean to yawn so loud.
jpnChrName: ふわ～あ…… すみません、あくびが。
jpnSearchText:
ふわ～あ……
すみません、あくびが。

engChrName: It's okay to go to sleep if you wanna get some shuteye, y'know.
engSearchText:
It's okay to go to sleep if you wanna get some
shuteye, y'know.
jpnChrName: 眠たくなったら 遠慮せずに休んどけよ。
jpnSearchText:
眠たくなったら
遠慮せずに休んどけよ。

engChrName: The seats all recline, so you should be able to get comfy. Just make sure your seatbelt's nice and tight first.
engSearchText:
The seats all recline, so you should be able to
get comfy. Just make sure your seatbelt's nice and
tight first.
jpnChrName: リクライニングしていいが シートベルトは忘れずにな。
jpnSearchText:
リクライニングしていいが
シートベルトは忘れずにな。

engChrName: None of us would mind if you got some rest, too, by the way. We've passed a number of pit stops already.
engSearchText:
None of us would mind if you got some rest, too, by
the way. We've passed a number of pit stops already.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんも無理はしないでくださいね？ ＳＡ（サービスエリア）も何回か飛ばしていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんも無理はしないでくださいね？
ＳＡ（サービスエリア）も何回か飛ばしていますし。

engChrName: Ahh, don't worry 'bout me. I'm used to long drives like these.
engSearchText:
Ahh, don't worry 'bout me. I'm used to long drives
like these.
jpnChrName: 心配すんな、長距離運転は慣れている。
jpnSearchText: 心配すんな、長距離運転は慣れている。

engChrName: If I really need it that bad, I'll just let this little punk take over.
engSearchText:
If I really need it that bad, I'll just let this little punk
take over.
jpnChrName: いざとなりゃこっちのガキに 代わりゃあいいだけだしな。
jpnSearchText:
いざとなりゃこっちのガキに
代わりゃあいいだけだしな。

engChrName: Works for me—I'm still young, so I can actually DO all-nighters.
engSearchText:
Works for me—I'm still young, so I can actually
DO all-nighters.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、いいぜ。 若いからオールも余裕だしな。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、いいぜ。
若いからオールも余裕だしな。

engChrName: *yaaawn*... Oh! I've been meaning to ask.
engSearchText: *yaaawn*... Oh! I've been meaning to ask.
jpnChrName: ふわ……あ、そういえば！
jpnSearchText: ふわ……あ、そういえば！

engChrName: Do people really not drink camel's milk in the Republic?
engSearchText:
Do people really not drink camel's milk in
the Republic?
jpnChrName: やっぱりラクダのミルクって 共和国じゃ飲まれないんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりラクダのミルクって
共和国じゃ飲まれないんですよね？

engChrName: Was it the story about the melfita that made you want to ask?
engSearchText:
Was it the story about the melfita that made you want
to ask?
jpnChrName: ああ、“メルフィータ”っていう 例のショコラの……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、“メルフィータ”っていう
例のショコラの……

engChrName: But that's right. You don't see camels much outside of the Central East.
engSearchText:
But that's right. You don't see camels much outside of
the Central East.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そもそもラクダ自体、 中東の方しかいないみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そもそもラクダ自体、
中東の方しかいないみたいですし。

engChrName: Did you used to drink it back home or something?
engSearchText: Did you used to drink it back home or something?
jpnChrName: なんだ、故郷じゃ 普通に飲まれてたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、故郷じゃ
普通に飲まれてたのかよ？

engChrName: Nope. Our village is at the base of a mountain, so we don't keep any camels back home, either.
engSearchText:
Nope. Our village is at the base of a mountain, so we
don't keep any camels back home, either.
jpnChrName: いえ、クルガは山脈の麓なので ラクダはいませんでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
いえ、クルガは山脈の麓なので
ラクダはいませんでしたけど……

engChrName: I've just had some during a few of our trips.
engSearchText: I've just had some during a few of our trips.
jpnChrName: 遠征に行った先で何度か 飲ませてもらったことがあって。
jpnSearchText:
遠征に行った先で何度か
飲ませてもらったことがあって。

engChrName: It tasted so good, though! It's much thicker than cow and sheep's milk.
engSearchText:
It tasted so good, though! It's much thicker than cow
and sheep's milk.
jpnChrName: 牛や羊のミルクよりも濃厚で とっても美味しかったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
牛や羊のミルクよりも濃厚で
とっても美味しかったですっ。

engChrName: Huh. I wonder if it's like kumis. That's good stuff.
engSearchText: Huh. I wonder if it's like kumis. That's good stuff.
jpnChrName: へえ、馬乳酒みたいにしても 旨そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、馬乳酒みたいにしても
旨そうだな。

engChrName: You make me want to try it now! Heehee.
engSearchText: You make me want to try it now! Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それを聞くと ちょっと飲んでみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それを聞くと
ちょっと飲んでみたいですね。

engChrName: Camel's milk is supposed to be really valuable since they don't produce much of it.
engSearchText:
Camel's milk is supposed to be really valuable since
they don't produce much of it.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみにラクダは乳自体が あまり取れないから貴重らしいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみにラクダは乳自体が
あまり取れないから貴重らしいぜ？

engChrName: Never tried any myself, but it's supposed to be a good alternative for people who're allergic to cow's milk.
engSearchText:
Never tried any myself, but it's supposed to be a good
alternative for people who're allergic to cow's milk.
jpnChrName: 俺も飲んだことはねぇが 牛乳アレルギーでもイケるって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も飲んだことはねぇが
牛乳アレルギーでもイケるって話だ。

engChrName: It's much higher in protein, vitamins, and iron, while at the same time much lower in fat content.
engSearchText:
It's much higher in protein, vitamins, and iron, while
at the same time much lower in fat content.
jpnChrName: その上高タンパクで低脂肪、 ビタミンや鉄分も数倍あるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
その上高タンパクで低脂肪、
ビタミンや鉄分も数倍あるらしい。

engChrName: They also say it's tough to bake with, though, so kinda surprising that someone would try makin' chocolate with it.
engSearchText:
They also say it's tough to bake with, though, so
kinda surprising that someone would try makin'
chocolate with it.
jpnChrName: 加工が難しいそうだが、それを上手く 仕上げてショコラにするとはねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
加工が難しいそうだが、それを上手く
仕上げてショコラにするとはねぇ……

engChrName: You are an encyclopedia for the weirdest shit...
engSearchText: You are an encyclopedia for the weirdest shit...
jpnChrName: どんだけ調べてきてんだっつの……
jpnSearchText: どんだけ調べてきてんだっつの……

engChrName: You guys hauled your asses over to Langport 'cause Cao bribed him with sweets, too, right? We are so screwed if Almata learns his weak point.
engSearchText:
You guys hauled your asses over to Langport 'cause
Cao bribed him with sweets, too, right? We are so
screwed if Almata learns his weak point.
jpnChrName: 煌都の件もツァオに釣られたみてぇだし、 敵にスイーツ振る舞われたらどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
煌都の件もツァオに釣られたみてぇだし、
敵にスイーツ振る舞われたらどうすんだ？

engChrName: Y-You make a good point...
engSearchText: Y-You make a good point...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……心配ですね。
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……心配ですね。

engChrName: I...guess we'll have to learn how to make even nicer confections to keep him loyal to us?
engSearchText:
I...guess we'll have to learn how to make even nicer
confections to keep him loyal to us?
jpnChrName: えと……こちらも負けないくらい 美味しいお菓子を作るしかっ。
jpnSearchText:
えと……こちらも負けないくらい
美味しいお菓子を作るしかっ。

engChrName: I can't ALWAYS be bought, you know...
engSearchText: I can't ALWAYS be bought, you know...
jpnChrName: いや君たち…… さすがにそこは弁えてるからね？
jpnSearchText:
いや君たち……
さすがにそこは弁えてるからね？

engChrName: Changing topics, Nina seems like such a lovely person on top of her already being a talented actress, doesn't she?
engSearchText:
Changing topics, Nina seems like such a lovely
person on top of her already being a talented actress,
doesn't she?
jpnChrName: そういえば──ニナさんって 女優を抜きにしても素敵ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば──ニナさんって
女優を抜きにしても素敵ですよね。

engChrName: She's only two years older than me, but she's so composed and levelheaded.
engSearchText:
She's only two years older than me, but she's so
composed and levelheaded.
jpnChrName: 私と二つしか違わないのに すごくしっかりしていて……
jpnSearchText:
私と二つしか違わないのに
すごくしっかりしていて……

engChrName: Yeah. She stood her ground even when those monsters all showed up.
engSearchText:
Yeah. She stood her ground even when those
monsters all showed up.
jpnChrName: あ、魔獣に襲われかけた時も なんだか毅然としてた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
あ、魔獣に襲われかけた時も
なんだか毅然としてた気がします。

engChrName: She's not a warrior, but she did have this noble kinda aura to her.
engSearchText:
She's not a warrior, but she did have this noble kinda
aura to her.
jpnChrName: 戦士とは違いますけど 凜とした“息吹”を感じましたね。
jpnSearchText:
戦士とは違いますけど
凜とした“息吹”を感じましたね。

engChrName: Yeah. Quite a woman.
engSearchText: Yeah. Quite a woman.
jpnChrName: ああ、実際大したモンだと思うぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、実際大したモンだと思うぞ。

engChrName: Not much like your average Easterner, either. I don't think she's from Langport, is she?
engSearchText:
Not much like your average Easterner, either. I don't
think she's from Langport, is she?
jpnChrName: 東方系の枠にはまらないっつーか── たしか煌都の出身じゃねえんだよな？
jpnSearchText:
東方系の枠にはまらないっつーか──
たしか煌都の出身じゃねえんだよな？

engChrName: No, but it's not like every Easterner in this part of the world comes from Langport.
engSearchText:
No, but it's not like every Easterner in this part of the
world comes from Langport.
jpnChrName: ま、別に東方人全員が 煌都出身ってわけでもねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、別に東方人全員が
煌都出身ってわけでもねぇしな。

engChrName: We've got Longlai in Eastern Calvard and a place like the Eastern Quarter over in Crossbell out west, to name two big hubs.
engSearchText:
We've got Longlai in Eastern Calvard and a
place like the Eastern Quarter over in Crossbell
out west, to name two big hubs.
jpnChrName: 東には《龍來（ロンライ）》ってのもあるし、 西のクロスベルにも東方人街はある。
jpnSearchText:
東には《龍來（ロンライ）》ってのもあるし、
西のクロスベルにも東方人街はある。

engChrName: And she's deliberately gone out of her way to present herself as more white, too.
engSearchText:
And she's deliberately gone out of her way to present
herself as more white, too.
jpnChrName: ……ま、それ以前にあの娘は東方らしさを あえて出さねぇようにしてるっぽいが。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、それ以前にあの娘は東方らしさを
あえて出さねぇようにしてるっぽいが。

engChrName: Not judging, to make it clear. That's her call to make.
engSearchText: Not judging, to make it clear. That's her call to make.
jpnChrName: それはそれでソイツの自由だろ。
jpnSearchText: それはそれでソイツの自由だろ。

engChrName: I'm confused. I feel like I'm missing something...
engSearchText: I'm confused. I feel like I'm missing something...
jpnChrName: ？　えっと、それはどういう……？
jpnSearchText: ？　えっと、それはどういう……？

engChrName: It's...a bit of a Calvard problem. A delicate one.
engSearchText: It's...a bit of a Calvard problem. A delicate one.
jpnChrName: ……その、 共和国ならではの問題と言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
……その、
共和国ならではの問題と言いますか。

engChrName: After the revolution a hundred years ago, discrimination on the basis of identity, race, and culture were all abolished.
engSearchText:
After the revolution a hundred years ago,
discrimination on the basis of identity, race, and
culture were all abolished.
jpnChrName: 百年前の民主化革命で、身分や人種、 文化的な差別は撤廃されて……
jpnSearchText:
百年前の民主化革命で、身分や人種、
文化的な差別は撤廃されて……

engChrName: Our constitution makes it possible for us all to live in harmony with one another.
engSearchText:
Our constitution makes it possible for us all to live
in harmony with one another.
jpnChrName: 共和国憲章の下に、様々な人種、 民族が共存できるようになりました。
jpnSearchText:
共和国憲章の下に、様々な人種、
民族が共存できるようになりました。

engChrName: And to a certain extent, we do—at least on the surface.
engSearchText:
And to a certain extent, we do—at least on
the surface.
jpnChrName: ───あくまで、表向きは。
jpnSearchText: ───あくまで、表向きは。

engChrName: Oh... Do you mean all the racial terrorism that's been happening?
engSearchText:
Oh... Do you mean all the racial terrorism that's
been happening?
jpnChrName: あ…… さっきの民族テロ、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
さっきの民族テロ、ですか。

engChrName: Prejudice runs reeeal deep in Calvard.
engSearchText: Prejudice runs reeeal deep in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ハッ、結構根深いみてぇだぜ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、結構根深いみてぇだぜ？

engChrName: There isn't much over in Langport, but up north? Hoo, boy.
engSearchText:
There isn't much over in Langport, but up north?
Hoo, boy.
jpnChrName: 煌都の方じゃほとんどねぇが カルバードの北部なんかは特にな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都の方じゃほとんどねぇが
カルバードの北部なんかは特にな。

engChrName: You got white supremacists stuck in Calvard's past who raised some hell with Easterners—and Central Easterners sometimes, too.
engSearchText:
You got white supremacists stuck in Calvard's past
who raised some hell with Easterners—and Central
Easterners sometimes, too.
jpnChrName: 旧王国系──白人至上主義の連中が 目の仇の東方系、たまに中東系に起こす。
jpnSearchText:
旧王国系──白人至上主義の連中が
目の仇の東方系、たまに中東系に起こす。

engChrName: Things came to a head when Crossbell tried declaring its independence and during the economic crises that followed, but it's calmed down some since.
engSearchText:
Things came to a head when Crossbell tried declaring
its independence and during the economic crises that
followed, but it's calmed down some since.
jpnChrName: 独立国騒ぎで経済恐慌が起きた時が ピークだったが、まあ今は落ち着いてんな。
jpnSearchText:
独立国騒ぎで経済恐慌が起きた時が
ピークだったが、まあ今は落ち着いてんな。

engChrName: Though that's only because Calvard's been basking in the prosperity of the Empire's reparations.
engSearchText:
Though that's only because Calvard's been basking in
the prosperity of the Empire's reparations.
jpnChrName: ……帝国からの莫大な賠償金で 共和国全体が潤いましたから。
jpnSearchText:
……帝国からの莫大な賠償金で
共和国全体が潤いましたから。

engChrName: It isn't as if racism itself has disappeared.
engSearchText: It isn't as if racism itself has disappeared.
jpnChrName: それでも完全に 無くなったわけじゃないんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでも完全に
無くなったわけじゃないんでしょう。

engChrName: It's too bad that's not the case...
engSearchText: It's too bad that's not the case...
jpnChrName: ……そう、なんですね。
jpnSearchText: ……そう、なんですね。

engChrName: Course, Heiyue's never taken it lying down. They hit back hard.
engSearchText:
Course, Heiyue's never taken it lying down. They hit
back hard.
jpnChrName: つっても黒月あたりはその分、 相応にやり返してるってのもある。
jpnSearchText:
つっても黒月あたりはその分、
相応にやり返してるってのもある。

engChrName: So there's that, too. It's not all one-sided.
engSearchText: So there's that, too. It's not all one-sided.
jpnChrName: そこら辺はお互い様かもしれねぇが。
jpnSearchText: そこら辺はお互い様かもしれねぇが。

engChrName: Huh. That's a pretty mature take for you.
engSearchText: Huh. That's a pretty mature take for you.
jpnChrName: へえ……？ お前にしちゃ大人な意見だな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ……？
お前にしちゃ大人な意見だな。

engChrName: Oh, shut up. I just hate stereotypes, that's all.
engSearchText: Oh, shut up. I just hate stereotypes, that's all.
jpnChrName: るせえ、レッテル張りなんざ 下らねえってだけの話だろ。
jpnSearchText:
るせえ、レッテル張りなんざ
下らねえってだけの話だろ。

engChrName: I agree with you there. We're all individuals.
engSearchText: I agree with you there. We're all individuals.
jpnChrName: そうですね…… 結局は“その人”でしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……
結局は“その人”でしょうから。

engChrName: It's just a shame that a lot of people in this world can't see others that way...
engSearchText:
It's just a shame that a lot of people in this world can't
see others that way...
jpnChrName: でも、そんな風に考えられない人も 世の中には少なからずいる……
jpnSearchText:
でも、そんな風に考えられない人も
世の中には少なからずいる……

engChrName: Central Easterners have a lot of mira, so that adds to the friction, too.
engSearchText:
Central Easterners have a lot of mira, so that adds to
the friction, too.
jpnChrName: ……ま、東方系はミラを持ってるから その分軋轢も生まれやすいんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、東方系はミラを持ってるから
その分軋轢も生まれやすいんだろう。

engChrName: They've contributed a good amount to Calvard's development in technology and academics.
engSearchText:
They've contributed a good amount to Calvard's
development in technology and academics.
jpnChrName: 逆に中東系は技術や学問なんかで 昔からカルバードに貢献してきた。
jpnSearchText:
逆に中東系は技術や学問なんかで
昔からカルバードに貢献してきた。

engChrName: Their investments are a large reason why Verne and the Basel Institute of Science have become as big as they are.
engSearchText:
Their investments are a large reason why Verne and
the Basel Institute of Science have become as big as
they are.
jpnChrName: 《ヴェルヌ社》に《バーゼル理科大学》…… どちらも中東資本や学問の影響がデカいしな。
jpnSearchText:
《ヴェルヌ社》に《バーゼル理科大学》……
どちらも中東資本や学問の影響がデカいしな。

engChrName: And it's not just financial investments. It's well known that one of my great-grandfather's three disciples has a Central Eastern background.
engSearchText:
And it's not just financial investments. It's well
known that one of my great-grandfather's three
disciples has a Central Eastern background.
jpnChrName: 私の曾祖父、Ｃ・エプスタインの 三高弟と言われるＬ・ハミルトン博士──
jpnSearchText:
私の曾祖父、Ｃ・エプスタインの
三高弟と言われるＬ・ハミルトン博士──

engChrName: Professor Hamilton, if you know her name.
engSearchText: Professor Hamilton, if you know her name.
jpnChrName: その方も中東系なのは有名な話ですね。
jpnSearchText: その方も中東系なのは有名な話ですね。

engChrName: Oh! Yeah, I've heard of her before!
engSearchText: Oh! Yeah, I've heard of her before!
jpnChrName: ！　名前は聞いたことがあります！
jpnSearchText: ！　名前は聞いたことがあります！

engChrName: Still...it's sad to think that there are those out there who hate any contribution made just because of the people who made it.
engSearchText:
Still...it's sad to think that there are those out there
who hate any contribution made just because of the
people who made it.
jpnChrName: でも……きっとそれを 快く思わない人たちもいる……
jpnSearchText:
でも……きっとそれを
快く思わない人たちもいる……

engChrName: I guess I've still got a lot to learn about this country, huh?
engSearchText:
I guess I've still got a lot to learn about this
country, huh?
jpnChrName: わたし、まだまだ勉強が足りません。
jpnSearchText: わたし、まだまだ勉強が足りません。

engChrName: Feri...
engSearchText: Feri...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……

jpnChrName: ……ハン。
jpnSearchText: ……ハン。

engChrName: The younger crowd doesn't really dwell as much on where people come from, though.
engSearchText:
The younger crowd doesn't really dwell as much on
where people come from, though.
jpnChrName: ま、お前ら若い世代はそういう違いも あまり感じてねぇんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前ら若い世代はそういう違いも
あまり感じてねぇんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I say keep it that way as you grow.
engSearchText: I say keep it that way as you grow.
jpnChrName: 頭の固い連中なんぞに左右されねえで 風通しをどんどん良くして行けよ。
jpnSearchText:
頭の固い連中なんぞに左右されねえで
風通しをどんどん良くして行けよ。

engChrName: Us oldies will be watchin' over you with pride as we sip our tea.
engSearchText:
Us oldies will be watchin' over you with pride as we
sip our tea.
jpnChrName: 年寄りは茶でも啜って見守ってるからよ。
jpnSearchText: 年寄りは茶でも啜って見守ってるからよ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: You're not much older than us, you know...
engSearchText: You're not much older than us, you know...
jpnChrName: もう、ヴァンさんだって 十分若いんですから……
jpnSearchText:
もう、ヴァンさんだって
十分若いんですから……

engChrName: Heh. Don't throw out your back just yet, gramps.
engSearchText: Heh. Don't throw out your back just yet, gramps.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 投げてんじゃねーぞジジイ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
投げてんじゃねーぞジジイ。

engChrName: It's the job of your generation to pave the road ahead so we can have a smoother ride.
engSearchText:

suspicions about him couldn't be more off.
jpnChrName: そっちの意味じゃシロって伝えたら 露骨に落ち込んではいやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの意味じゃシロって伝えたら
露骨に落ち込んではいやがったな。

engChrName: 'Kinkster'? And what kind of crime?
engSearchText: 'Kinkster'? And what kind of crime?
jpnChrName: ……痴女？　犯罪行為？
jpnSearchText: ……痴女？　犯罪行為？

engChrName: I'm having trouble following this conversation...
engSearchText: I'm having trouble following this conversation...
jpnChrName: えっと、何だか僕だけ ついて行けてないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、何だか僕だけ
ついて行けてないんだけど……

engChrName: That's hardly surprising.
engSearchText: That's hardly surprising.
jpnChrName: ふふ、無理もないかと。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、無理もないかと。

engChrName: Ahaha... It's not that important, but hopefully we'll get the chance to fill you in at some point.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... It's not that important, but hopefully we'll
get the chance to fill you in at some point.
jpnChrName: あはは…… 機会があればそのうちにでも。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
機会があればそのうちにでも。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm gonna hit up Dingo and Bermotti for starters.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm gonna hit up Dingo and Bermotti
for starters.
jpnChrName: とりあえずディンゴと ベルモッティには振っておくか。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえずディンゴと
ベルモッティには振っておくか。

engChrName: Mmm... I'm too full to eat any more...
engSearchText: Mmm... I'm too full to eat any more...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ…… もう食べられないよ～……
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……
もう食べられないよ～……

engChrName: On the way to Oración, they came across several checkpoints put up due to the emergency declaration, but the CID had arranged for them to pass through.
engSearchText:
On the way to Oración, they came across several
checkpoints put up due to the emergency declaration,
but the CID had arranged for them to pass through.
jpnChrName: 途中、非常事態宣言による検問が何度かあったが ＣＩＤの手回しによってそのまま通過でき──
jpnSearchText:
途中、非常事態宣言による検問が何度かあったが
ＣＩＤの手回しによってそのまま通過でき──

engChrName: After a brief pit stop in Anchorville, they hit the road northeast.
engSearchText:
After a brief pit stop in Anchorville, they hit the
road northeast.
jpnChrName: 中継都市アンカーヴィルのＳＡで休憩した後、 ヴァンたちは一路北東へ向かった。
jpnSearchText:
中継都市アンカーヴィルのＳＡで休憩した後、
ヴァンたちは一路北東へ向かった。

engChrName: The city we are headed to was the capital of Calvard before the revolution one hundred years ago.
engSearchText:
The city we are headed to was the capital of Calvard
before the revolution one hundred years ago.
jpnChrName: これから向かう古都オラシオンは、 百年前の民主化革命以前の旧王都……
jpnSearchText:
これから向かう古都オラシオンは、
百年前の民主化革命以前の旧王都……

engChrName: It has a population of around 280,000 people, making it the third most populous city in the Republic.
engSearchText:
It has a population of around 280,000 people, making
it the third most populous city in the Republic.
jpnChrName: 人口２８万人になる共和国第三の都市だ。
jpnSearchText: 人口２８万人になる共和国第三の都市だ。

engChrName: That's a lot fewer people than the capital's 800,000 and Langport's 550,000.
engSearchText:
That's a lot fewer people than the capital's 800,000
and Langport's 550,000.
jpnChrName: ８０万近くの首都に、５５万の煌都と 比べりゃ落ちる感じだけどなァ。
jpnSearchText:
８０万近くの首都に、５５万の煌都と
比べりゃ落ちる感じだけどなァ。

engChrName: But man, oh, man, this bike you got here is pure fire! I can't wipe the grin off my face!
engSearchText:
But man, oh, man, this bike you got here is pure fire!
I can't wipe the grin off my face!
jpnChrName: ──しかし爺さん、このバイクすげぇな！ テンション上がりまくりだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
──しかし爺さん、このバイクすげぇな！
テンション上がりまくりだぜ！

engChrName: Heh. I'm glad you are enjoying it, but do ride with care.
engSearchText:
Heh. I'm glad you are enjoying it, but do ride
with care.
jpnChrName: フ…… 安全運転を心がけて堪能するとよい。
jpnSearchText:
フ……
安全運転を心がけて堪能するとよい。

engChrName: Bah. Didn't get half that reaction when he was drivin' MY girl...
engSearchText:
Bah. Didn't get half that reaction when he was drivin'
MY girl...
jpnChrName: チッ、コイツを運転してた時より 反応がいいじゃねぇか……
jpnSearchText:
チッ、コイツを運転してた時より
反応がいいじゃねぇか……

engChrName: I guess even obsessing over something has its downs, huh?
engSearchText:
I guess even obsessing over something has its
downs, huh?
jpnChrName: 複雑だなぁ、マニア心って。
jpnSearchText: 複雑だなぁ、マニア心って。

engChrName: Heehee. I think your truck is nice and comfy, if it helps.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I think your truck is nice and comfy, if
it helps.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まあこっちの 乗り心地も良い感じだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、まあこっちの
乗り心地も良い感じだけどね。

engChrName: ...Now, we know that many other groups are also making their way to our destination.
engSearchText:
...Now, we know that many other groups are also
making their way to our destination.
jpnChrName: ──既に他の勢力も続々と オラシオン入りを果たしているようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──既に他の勢力も続々と
オラシオン入りを果たしているようだ。

engChrName: I am aware of Heiyue and several jaeger corps...
engSearchText: I am aware of Heiyue and several jaeger corps...
jpnChrName: 私が知る限り、黒月に複数の猟兵団──
jpnSearchText: 私が知る限り、黒月に複数の猟兵団──

engChrName: ...as well as the Gralsritter, and the Papal Guard's secret unit.
engSearchText:
...as well as the Gralsritter, and the Papal Guard's
secret unit.
jpnChrName: そして“星杯騎士”たちに、 恐らくは僧兵庁の隠密部隊もであろう。
jpnSearchText:
そして“星杯騎士”たちに、
恐らくは僧兵庁の隠密部隊もであろう。

engChrName: You were in the Gralsritter if I recall, right?
engSearchText: You were in the Gralsritter if I recall, right?
jpnChrName: 星杯騎士…… ベルガルドさんの古巣っていう。
jpnSearchText:
星杯騎士……
ベルガルドさんの古巣っていう。

engChrName: Yeah. It's an elite force affiliated with the Congregation for the Sacraments that primarily exists to recover artifacts.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's an elite force affiliated with the
Congregation for the Sacraments that primarily exists
to recover artifacts.
jpnChrName: ああ、古代遺物（アーティファクト）の回収を 目的とする《封聖省》の精鋭騎士団だな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、古代遺物（アーティファクト）の回収を
目的とする《封聖省》の精鋭騎士団だな。

engChrName: And then we have the Papal Guard, the Holy City of Arteria's peacekeeping force.
engSearchText:
And then we have the Papal Guard, the Holy City of
Arteria's peacekeeping force.
jpnChrName: それとは別に《僧兵庁》──
jpnSearchText: それとは別に《僧兵庁》──

engChrName: So they have a special unit of sorts, too?
engSearchText: So they have a special unit of sorts, too?
jpnChrName: アルテリア法国の治安維持組織も “実働部隊”を擁しているんですね。
jpnSearchText:
アルテリア法国の治安維持組織も
“実働部隊”を擁しているんですね。

engChrName: I'm no expert on them, myself. Can you tell us a bit about them?
engSearchText:
I'm no expert on them, myself. Can you tell us a bit
about them?
jpnChrName: そっちは俺も噂程度だな。 ──実際、どういう連中なんです？
jpnSearchText:
そっちは俺も噂程度だな。
──実際、どういう連中なんです？

engChrName: Certainly. As you may be aware, the Gralsritter is a relatively small organization comprised of around a thousand people.
engSearchText:
Certainly. As you may be aware, the Gralsritter is a
relatively small organization comprised of around a
thousand people.
jpnChrName: うむ、そもそも星杯騎士団は 関係者も含め千名くらいの規模でしかない。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、そもそも星杯騎士団は
関係者も含め千名くらいの規模でしかない。

engChrName: The Papal Guard is a force 30,000 strong that answers directly to the Congregation for Divine Worship. It took part in the war against the Empire.
engSearchText:
The Papal Guard is a force 30,000 strong that answers
directly to the Congregation for Divine Worship.
It took part in the war against the Empire.
jpnChrName: 対する僧兵庁は、典礼省直下の法国守備軍── ３万規模で先の“大戦”にも参加していた。
jpnSearchText:
対する僧兵庁は、典礼省直下の法国守備軍──
３万規模で先の“大戦”にも参加していた。

engChrName: The relationship between the two congregations was strained even before that, but it became more so after the war.
engSearchText:
The relationship between the two congregations was
strained even before that, but it became more so after
the war.
jpnChrName: ……その辺りから、以前からあった 封聖省と典礼省の対立も激化していてな。
jpnSearchText:
……その辺りから、以前からあった
封聖省と典礼省の対立も激化していてな。

engChrName: Still, while the Papal Guard may have the upper hand in numbers, the Gralsritter has significant advantages that the guard does not.
engSearchText:
Still, while the Papal Guard may have the upper hand
in numbers, the Gralsritter has significant advantages
that the guard does not.
jpnChrName: ──数こそ劣るものの、 騎士団には僧兵庁にはない“強み”がある。
jpnSearchText:
──数こそ劣るものの、
騎士団には僧兵庁にはない“強み”がある。

engChrName: Chief among them are the Dominions—the twelve knights that lead the organization, one of whom I used to be.
engSearchText:
Chief among them are the Dominions—the twelve
knights that lead the organization, one of whom I
used to be.
jpnChrName: 特に団を束ねる１２名の特別な騎士──
jpnSearchText: 特に団を束ねる１２名の特別な騎士──

engChrName: Their power, and the power of the unique abilities they wield, is overwhelming.
engSearchText:
Their power, and the power of the unique abilities
they wield, is overwhelming.
jpnChrName: 私もかつてそうだった《守護騎士（ドミニオン）》と呼ばれる 面々の“異能”は圧倒的であろう。
jpnSearchText:
私もかつてそうだった《守護騎士（ドミニオン）》と呼ばれる
面々の“異能”は圧倒的であろう。

engChrName: You encountered the fourth and eleventh among them in the Blacklight District some time ago.
engSearchText:
You encountered the fourth and eleventh among
them in the Blacklight District some time ago.
jpnChrName: おぬしらが黒芒街で見たという２名── “第四位”と“第十一位”も尋常ではない。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしらが黒芒街で見たという２名──
“第四位”と“第十一位”も尋常ではない。

engChrName: Their strength, too, is incredible—incredible enough to match that pair from the society we met yesterday.
engSearchText:
Their strength, too, is incredible—incredible enough
to match that pair from the society we met yesterday.
jpnChrName: 恐らく昨日の結社の二人にも届くほどに。
jpnSearchText: 恐らく昨日の結社の二人にも届くほどに。

engChrName: For real? Damn.
engSearchText: For real? Damn.
jpnChrName: チッ、そこまでかよ……
jpnSearchText: <C1>チッ、そこまでかよ……

engChrName: That red-haired woman seemed so adorable to me...
engSearchText: That red-haired woman seemed so adorable to me...
jpnChrName: 女性の方は意外と 可愛らしい雰囲気でしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
女性の方は意外と
可愛らしい雰囲気でしたけど……

engChrName: That weapon she had wasn't so adorable, though.
engSearchText: That weapon she had wasn't so adorable, though.
jpnChrName: ……ですが尋常ではない 得物を持っていました。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが尋常ではない
得物を持っていました。

engChrName: Gotta have some bite to stand up against the Direwolf. Most people'd be scared outta their mind.
engSearchText:
Gotta have some bite to stand up against
the Direwolf. Most people'd be scared outta
their mind.
jpnChrName: ま、あの痩せ狼相手に ガン飛ばしてたくらいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あの痩せ狼相手に
ガン飛ばしてたくらいだからな。

engChrName: So, wait. Then the other hooded guy who was down there that day...
engSearchText:
So, wait. Then the other hooded guy who was down
there that day...
jpnChrName: それじゃ、あの場所に居合わせた “もう一人”の方ってのが……？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、あの場所に居合わせた
“もう一人”の方ってのが……？

engChrName: He is Iscariot's second-in-command—Iscariot being the Papal Guard's secret unit I mentioned earlier.
engSearchText:
He is Iscariot's second-in-command—Iscariot being
the Papal Guard's secret unit I mentioned earlier.
jpnChrName: うむ──おそらくは 僧兵庁隠密部隊《イスカリオ》の副兵長。
jpnSearchText:
うむ──おそらくは
僧兵庁隠密部隊《イスカリオ》の副兵長。

engChrName: His name is Ashladd. He does not have any extraordinary abilities like a Dominion, but he is still a veteran in combat.
engSearchText:
His name is Ashladd. He does not have any
extraordinary abilities like a Dominion, but he is still
a veteran in combat.
jpnChrName: 名をアシュラッドといい、 異能の持ち主ではないが百戦錬磨の僧兵だ。
jpnSearchText:
名をアシュラッドといい、
異能の持ち主ではないが百戦錬磨の僧兵だ。

engChrName: He learned how to wield a battle mace from me personally, so in a sense, he is another student of mine.
engSearchText:
He learned how to wield a battle mace from me
personally, so in a sense, he is another student
of mine.
jpnChrName: 私が戦鎚矛（バトルメイス）を指南した事もある── おぬしの兄弟子と言えなくもないな。
jpnSearchText:
私が戦鎚矛（バトルメイス）を指南した事もある──
おぬしの兄弟子と言えなくもないな。

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどね。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどね。

engChrName: With the Papal Guard being so big, I'm sure even their secret unit's pretty sizable, huh?
engSearchText:
With the Papal Guard being so big, I'm sure even
their secret unit's pretty sizable, huh?
jpnChrName: しかも部隊ってことは 複数名が入ってきてるわけね。
jpnSearchText:
しかも部隊ってことは
複数名が入ってきてるわけね。

engChrName: And the Oathbreaker is probably right that everyone taking part in this has their own schemes in mind, them included.
engSearchText:
And the Oathbreaker is probably right that everyone
taking part in this has their own schemes in mind,
them included.
jpnChrName: あの《破戒》が言ってたように それぞれの思惑がありそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あの《破戒》が言ってたように
それぞれの思惑がありそうだけど。

engChrName: Likely so. If I were to speculate, I would say that the Gralsritter aims to take Almata into custody and recover their artifacts.
engSearchText:
Likely so. If I were to speculate, I would say that the
Gralsritter aims to take Almata into custody and
recover their artifacts.
jpnChrName: うむ──恐らく騎士たちの目的は アルマータの拘束と古代遺物の回収であろう。
jpnSearchText:
うむ──恐らく騎士たちの目的は
アルマータの拘束と古代遺物の回収であろう。

engChrName: As for Iscariot, I believe they seek to destroy the artifacts or intercept their recovery...
engSearchText:
As for Iscariot, I believe they seek to destroy the
artifacts or intercept their recovery...
jpnChrName: 対するイスカリオの目的は 遺物回収の妨害、もしくは破壊──
jpnSearchText:
対するイスカリオの目的は
遺物回収の妨害、もしくは破壊──

engChrName: ...as well as execute all of Almata's members, who have no doubt long been branded as heretics.
engSearchText:
...as well as execute all of Almata's members, who
have no doubt long been branded as heretics.
jpnChrName: そして外法認定されたであろう アルマータの“断罪”に違いあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
そして外法認定されたであろう
アルマータの“断罪”に違いあるまい。

engChrName: 'Execute'...?
engSearchText: 'Execute'...?
jpnChrName: 断罪……
jpnSearchText: 断罪……

engChrName: So their job's to take out traitors and criminals? Sounds kinda like Heiyue's xiongshou.
engSearchText:
So their job's to take out traitors and criminals?
Sounds kinda like Heiyue's xiongshou.
jpnChrName: 裏切り者や重罪人の始末…… 黒月の凶手部隊みてぇなもんかよ。
jpnSearchText:
裏切り者や重罪人の始末……
黒月の凶手部隊みてぇなもんかよ。

engChrName: I didn't think there were people like that in the church.
engSearchText:
I didn't think there were people like that in
the church.
jpnChrName: 教会にもそんな奴らがいるとはな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>教会にもそんな奴らがいるとはな。

engChrName: The church's situation sounds complicated enough— and they're just a small portion of the groups we'll be facing.
engSearchText:
The church's situation sounds complicated enough—
and they're just a small portion of the groups we'll
be facing.
jpnChrName: 教会だけでもそんな状況…… それ以外にも裏勢力が山ほどか。
jpnSearchText:
教会だけでもそんな状況……
それ以外にも裏勢力が山ほどか。

engChrName: Once we arrive, our first goal should be assessing the situation on the ground, I suppose.
engSearchText:
Once we arrive, our first goal should be assessing the
situation on the ground, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ──いずれにせよ、現地の 状況把握は最優先みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよ、現地の
状況把握は最優先みたいだね。

engChrName: I expect to hear what headquarters plans to do soon as well.
engSearchText:
I expect to hear what headquarters plans to do soon
as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、“本社”の介入状況も そろそろ連絡があるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、“本社”の介入状況も
そろそろ連絡があるでしょう。

engChrName: I'll know for sure if there are any jaegers or warriors in the city once we get there.
engSearchText:
I'll know for sure if there are any jaegers or warriors in
the city once we get there.
jpnChrName: 戦士団や他の猟兵団も…… 来ていたら多分分かると思います。
jpnSearchText:
戦士団や他の猟兵団も……
来ていたら多分分かると思います。

engChrName: Judging by how many people are going to be gathering there, I wouldn't be surprised if Abi and the rest of our people come.
engSearchText:
Judging by how many people are going to be
gathering there, I wouldn't be surprised if Abi and the
rest of our people come.
jpnChrName: 相当数集まっているみたいですし 多分、お父さん（アブ）たちも……
jpnSearchText:
相当数集まっているみたいですし
多分、お父さん（アブ）たちも……

engChrName: We'll have to see what we can learn from the guild and the CID, too.
engSearchText:
We'll have to see what we can learn from the guild
and the CID, too.
jpnChrName: あとはＣＩＤからの情報に、 ギルドと話す必要もあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
あとはＣＩＤからの情報に、
ギルドと話す必要もあるだろう。

engChrName: As soon as we've finished contacting everyone and learning all we can, we'll get right to work.
engSearchText:
As soon as we've finished contacting everyone and
learning all we can, we'll get right to work.
jpnChrName: 到着しだい各方面と連絡、 ある程度掴んだら動き始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
到着しだい各方面と連絡、
ある程度掴んだら動き始めるぞ。

engChrName: All right!
engSearchText: All right!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Sounds like we're about to get real busy!
engSearchText: Sounds like we're about to get real busy!
jpnChrName: ハッ……忙しくなりそうだな！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ハッ……忙しくなりそうだな！

engChrName: Haha. You look more comfortable riding an orbal bike than I was expecting.
engSearchText:
Haha. You look more comfortable riding an
orbal bike than I was expecting.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハ、おぬしもなかなか 乗りこなしているではないか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハ、おぬしもなかなか
乗りこなしているではないか。

engChrName: I heard your undying love was to cars, so this comes as something of a surprise.
engSearchText:
I heard your undying love was to cars, so this comes
as something of a surprise.
jpnChrName: 車への拘りは聞いていたが バイクも乗っていたのだな？
jpnSearchText:
車への拘りは聞いていたが
バイクも乗っていたのだな？

engChrName: I've borrowed one from a friend a few times since they hit the market a couple years ago, but that's about all the ridin' experience I got.
engSearchText:
I've borrowed one from a friend a few times since
they hit the market a couple years ago, but that's
about all the ridin' experience I got.
jpnChrName: ２年前くらいに発売してから たまに知り合いに借りてたくらいですがね。
jpnSearchText:
２年前くらいに発売してから
たまに知り合いに借りてたくらいですがね。

engChrName: Nothin' beats my Ingert, but I'll give you that it's nice to feel the wind in your hair when you're out on the road.
engSearchText:
Nothin' beats my Ingert, but I'll give you that it's nice
to feel the wind in your hair when you're out on
the road.
jpnChrName: やっぱ相棒（インゲルト）の乗り心地が一番だが、 たまには風を感じながら走るのもいいもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ相棒（インゲルト）の乗り心地が一番だが、
たまには風を感じながら走るのもいいもんだ。

engChrName: Heh. That it is—a fine benefit that only two wheels can offer.
engSearchText:
Heh. That it is—a fine benefit that only two wheels
can offer.
jpnChrName: フフ……二輪ならではの魅力だな。
jpnSearchText: フフ……二輪ならではの魅力だな。

engChrName: Another being that attractive women often strike up conversations with me in pit stops and suchlike.
engSearchText:
Another being that attractive women often strike up
conversations with me in pit stops and suchlike.
jpnChrName: たまにＳＡなどで麗しき美女に 声を掛けられたりするのも悪くない気分だ。
jpnSearchText:
たまにＳＡなどで麗しき美女に
声を掛けられたりするのも悪くない気分だ。

engChrName: Well, look who's popular. You really are livin' it up now, huh?
engSearchText:
Well, look who's popular. You really are livin' it up
now, huh?
jpnChrName: モテモテじゃないッスか…… つくづく第二の人生を謳歌してるなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
モテモテじゃないッスか……
つくづく第二の人生を謳歌してるなぁ。

engChrName: I sure hope I'm like you or President Rocksmith when I'm your age.
engSearchText:
I sure hope I'm like you or President Rocksmith when
I'm your age.
jpnChrName: ロックスミス元大統領といい 羨ましい限りですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ロックスミス元大統領といい
羨ましい限りですよ。

engChrName: It is a luxury that only the aged get to enjoy when they are freed from the shackles of obligation that have held them all their lives.
engSearchText:
It is a luxury that only the aged get to enjoy when
they are freed from the shackles of obligation that
have held them all their lives.
jpnChrName: まあ、しがらみから解き放たれた 年寄りの特権というものだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、しがらみから解き放たれた
年寄りの特権というものだ。

engChrName: Still, there is plenty that only the young can enjoy in life—so I suggest you and your friends do just that.
engSearchText:
Still, there is plenty that only the young can enjoy in
life—so I suggest you and your friends do just that.
jpnChrName: 若者は“今”をとことん謳歌すればよい。 おぬしの元に集まった仲間たちとな。
jpnSearchText:
若者は“今”をとことん謳歌すればよい。
おぬしの元に集まった仲間たちとな。

engChrName: Heh. I dunno if I'm really that young anymore, but I get you.
engSearchText:
Heh. I dunno if I'm really that young anymore, but I
get you.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、 若者って歳でもありませんがね。
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、
若者って歳でもありませんがね。

engChrName: So...
engSearchText: So...
jpnChrName: ところで──
jpnSearchText: ところで──

engChrName: I take it they're the real reason you planned to go off on your own?
engSearchText:
I take it they're the real reason you planned to go off
on your own?
jpnChrName: あれですね？ 師父がこうして出かけた理由は。
jpnSearchText:
あれですね？
師父がこうして出かけた理由は。

engChrName: They're trying to keep their distance, but there's three cars behind us and two ahead.
engSearchText:
They're trying to keep their distance, but there's three
cars behind us and two ahead.
jpnChrName: 距離をとってやがるが…… 後方に３台、前方にも２台か。
jpnSearchText:
距離をとってやがるが……
後方に３台、前方にも２台か。

engChrName: Well, I thought it a shame to spoil an otherwise pleasant evening.
engSearchText:
Well, I thought it a shame to spoil an otherwise
pleasant evening.
jpnChrName: 今日はせっかくの夜── 騒がせるのは無粋というものだろう。
jpnSearchText:
今日はせっかくの夜──
騒がせるのは無粋というものだろう。

engChrName: I intend to lead them out to the outskirts of the city.
engSearchText: I intend to lead them out to the outskirts of the city.
jpnChrName: このまま郊外まで誘き出すぞ。
jpnSearchText: このまま郊外まで誘き出すぞ。

engChrName: Those guns are Zecht Arms models, huh?
engSearchText: Those guns are Zecht Arms models, huh?
jpnChrName: その武器…… 《ゼクトアームズ》製か。
jpnSearchText:
その武器……
《ゼクトアームズ》製か。

engChrName: So, you from the company?
engSearchText: So, you from the company?
jpnChrName: どうやらオラシオンに来てた 私設部隊みたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらオラシオンに来てた
私設部隊みたいだな。

engChrName: We didn't have to fight you in the underground— even if we've dealt with you in the past.
engSearchText:
We didn't have to fight you in the underground—
even if we've dealt with you in the past.
jpnChrName: デスゲームではかち合わなかったが…… ４ｓｐｇ絡みで揉めたことはあったか。
jpnSearchText:
デスゲームではかち合わなかったが……
４ｓｐｇ絡みで揉めたことはあったか。

engChrName: We didn't have to fight you in the underground, but we knew you were there.
engSearchText:
We didn't have to fight you in the underground, but
we knew you were there.
jpnChrName: デスゲームではかち合わなかったが。
jpnSearchText: デスゲームではかち合わなかったが。

engChrName: I'm well aware that you have been following me around these past few days.
engSearchText:
I'm well aware that you have been following me
around these past few days.
jpnChrName: ここ数日、 私の周辺で動いていたようでな。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日、
私の周辺で動いていたようでな。

engChrName: I would assume that is because you have somehow learned my former name.
engSearchText:
I would assume that is because you have somehow
learned my former name.
jpnChrName: どうやら知られてしまったらしい── 私が以前名乗っていた名前を。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら知られてしまったらしい──
私が以前名乗っていた名前を。

engChrName: That's right, Roaring Lion.
engSearchText: That's right, Roaring Lion.
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: その通りだ──元《吼天獅子》。
jpnSearchText: その通りだ──元《吼天獅子》。

engChrName: We thought you were finally dead, but here you are skulking around under some pseudonym!
engSearchText:
We thought you were finally dead, but here you are
skulking around under some pseudonym!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: まさか死んだはずの貴様が 名前を変えて生き永らえていようとは……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか死んだはずの貴様が
名前を変えて生き永らえていようとは……！

engChrName: We're here to pay you back for what you did to our company!
engSearchText:
We're here to pay you back for what you did to
our company!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: ４年前に受けた大損害の落とし前、 つけさせてもらうぞ……！！
jpnSearchText:
４年前に受けた大損害の落とし前、
つけさせてもらうぞ……！！

engChrName: ...Just what did you do?
engSearchText: ...Just what did you do?
jpnChrName: ……何やったんです？
jpnSearchText: ……何やったんです？

engChrName: Four years ago, they were testing a new weapon in an area I was operating in.
engSearchText:
Four years ago, they were testing a new weapon in an
area I was operating in.
jpnChrName: ４年前、彼奴らは私が活動していた地域で 開発中兵器の“テスト”をしておってな。
jpnSearchText:
４年前、彼奴らは私が活動していた地域で
開発中兵器の“テスト”をしておってな。

engChrName: During the tests, local civilians were placed in danger. I then stopped it by destroying the weapon and taking care of their members.
engSearchText:
During the tests, local civilians were placed in danger.
I then stopped it by destroying the weapon and taking
care of their members.
jpnChrName: 周辺住民を巻き込みそうになったところで介入し、 兵器もろとも壊滅させたことがあったのだ。
jpnSearchText:
周辺住民を巻き込みそうになったところで介入し、
兵器もろとも壊滅させたことがあったのだ。

engChrName: Pretty cut and dry, then.
engSearchText: Pretty cut and dry, then.
jpnChrName: ンなことが……
jpnSearchText: ンなことが……

engChrName: Sounds to me like you got what you deserved. Not the best justification to be followin' someone around.
engSearchText:
Sounds to me like you got what you deserved.
Not the best justification to be followin'
someone around.
jpnChrName: 完全に自業自得の逆恨み…… 流石に筋が通らねえんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
完全に自業自得の逆恨み……
流石に筋が通らねえんじゃねえか？

engChrName: If he hadn't interfered in our test, our company would be seeing even greater success than it already has!
engSearchText:
If he hadn't interfered in our test, our company would
be seeing even greater success than it already has!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: あの時の邪魔が無ければ、我が社は 今頃更なる躍進を果たしていたはずだ！
jpnSearchText:
あの時の邪魔が無ければ、我が社は
今頃更なる躍進を果たしていたはずだ！

engChrName: So now that he's lost that power of his, it's time he answered for his actions!
engSearchText:
So now that he's lost that power of his, it's time he
answered for his actions!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: “異能”とやらを失ったそうだな……！ 当時の恨みを晴らさせてもらうぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
“異能”とやらを失ったそうだな……！
当時の恨みを晴らさせてもらうぞ……！

engChrName: And if you're going to get in our way, spriggan, we'll take you down right with him!
engSearchText:
And if you're going to get in our way, spriggan, we'll
take you down right with him!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋、邪魔をするなら貴様ごとな！
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋、邪魔をするなら貴様ごとな！

engChrName: You are WAY underestimating my master here. If you honestly think you can take him down—
engSearchText:
You are WAY underestimating my master here.
If you honestly think you can take him down—
jpnChrName: ハッ、師父を甘く見過ぎだろ。 やれるもんなら──
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、師父を甘く見過ぎだろ。
やれるもんなら──

engChrName: No. I think this may be the perfect chance to show me what you currently know. Do not use your stun caliber.
engSearchText:
No. I think this may be the perfect chance to show
me what you currently know. Do not use your
stun caliber.
jpnChrName: ──いや、良い機会だ。 ヴァンよ、撃剣は控えよ。
jpnSearchText:
──いや、良い機会だ。
ヴァンよ、撃剣は控えよ。

engChrName: Show me the fruits of your Kunlun school teachings instead.
engSearchText:
Show me the fruits of your Kunlun school
teachings instead.
jpnChrName: 崑崙の教えと技……今改めて 私に見せてみるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
崑崙の教えと技……今改めて
私に見せてみるがいい。

engChrName: Heh. All right. If that's what you want.
engSearchText: Heh. All right. If that's what you want.
jpnChrName: ったく、分かりましたよ、師父。
jpnSearchText: ったく、分かりましたよ、師父。

engChrName: It's been a while since I last had to fight hand to hand, but here we go!
engSearchText:
It's been a while since I last had to fight hand to
hand, but here we go!
jpnChrName: 崑崙流ヴァン・アークライド── 久々に功夫（クンフー）を見てもらいましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
崑崙流ヴァン・アークライド──
久々に功夫（クンフー）を見てもらいましょうか！

engChrName: Very good! Then let's begin!
engSearchText: Very good! Then let's begin!
jpnChrName: 意気やよし──ゆくぞ、我が弟子よ！
jpnSearchText: 意気やよし──ゆくぞ、我が弟子よ！

engChrName: Haaaaaah...
engSearchText: Haaaaaah...
jpnChrName: ──コォォォオオオオオ……
jpnSearchText: <S5>──コォォォオオオオオ……

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊

engChrName: Wh-What the hell?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the hell?!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: こ、この圧力は……！！
jpnSearchText: こ、この圧力は……！！

engChrName: Oooh...! / Haaaaaah!
engSearchText: Oooh...! / Haaaaaah!
jpnChrName: うおおおおっ……！／はああああああっ……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>うおおおおっ……！／はああああああっ……！！

engChrName: Ugh... How is he still so strong even without his old abilities?
engSearchText:
Ugh... How is he still so strong even without his
old abilities?
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: ぐふっ…… 異能を失って、これか……
jpnSearchText:
ぐふっ……
異能を失って、これか……

engChrName: You'll regret this, spriggan!
engSearchText: You'll regret this, spriggan!
engHtmlText: ゼクトアームズ私設部隊
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋も、覚えていろ……
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋も、覚えていろ……

engChrName: *pant* Whew. Sure put me through my paces.
engSearchText: *pant* Whew. Sure put me through my paces.
jpnChrName: はあはあ……ったく、 無茶させてくれるもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……ったく、
無茶させてくれるもんだ。

engChrName: Please don't make me fight people packin' advanced weaponry with my bare fists again, Master...
engSearchText:
Please don't make me fight people packin' advanced
weaponry with my bare fists again, Master...
jpnChrName: 最新武装持った相手に 素手で挑ませないでくださいよ。
jpnSearchText:
最新武装持った相手に
素手で挑ませないでくださいよ。

engChrName: Haha! Yet you triumphed, did you not?
engSearchText: Haha! Yet you triumphed, did you not?
jpnChrName: ハハ、それでも切り抜けられたではないか。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、それでも切り抜けられたではないか。

engChrName: Your current combat style may be a mix of the Kunlun school and hollow style...
engSearchText:
Your current combat style may be a mix of the
Kunlun school and hollow style...
jpnChrName: おぬしの今の型は、崑崙流に “零式勁術”とやらを交えたもののようだが……
jpnSearchText:
おぬしの今の型は、崑崙流に
“零式勁術”とやらを交えたもののようだが……

engChrName: ...but I see that you did indeed fight using only the techniques that I taught you.
engSearchText:
...but I see that you did indeed fight using only the
techniques that I taught you.
jpnChrName: 今回は純粋に 私の教えた技のみを使ったようだな？
jpnSearchText:
今回は純粋に
私の教えた技のみを使ったようだな？

engChrName: Of course. If I didn't, this would've all been for nothing.
engSearchText:
Of course. If I didn't, this would've all been
for nothing.
jpnChrName: ええ……そうでないと、 意味が無かったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ええ……そうでないと、
意味が無かったんでしょう？

engChrName: You took advantage of you being targeted to make me remember my Kunlun roots.
engSearchText:
You took advantage of you being targeted to make
me remember my Kunlun roots.
jpnChrName: 自分が狙われている状況を利用して 改めて俺に崑崙の教えを思い出させる……
jpnSearchText:
自分が狙われている状況を利用して
改めて俺に崑崙の教えを思い出させる……

engChrName: You could've handled those guys on your own just fine, but you chose to invite me along just for that.
engSearchText:
You could've handled those guys on your own just
fine, but you chose to invite me along just for that.
jpnChrName: 師父なら一人で充分退けられた危機に 敢えて俺を誘い、同行させることで……
jpnSearchText:
師父なら一人で充分退けられた危機に
敢えて俺を誘い、同行させることで……

engChrName: Man...you really haven't changed at all.
engSearchText: Man...you really haven't changed at all.
jpnChrName: ったく、本当に相変わらずなお人だぜ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、本当に相変わらずなお人だぜ。

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnChrName: ハハ……
jpnSearchText: ハハ……

engChrName: Still, I do hope it went some way to reminding you of how you used to be.
engSearchText:
Still, I do hope it went some way to reminding you of
how you used to be.
jpnChrName: だが── 少しは立ち戻れたのではないか？
jpnSearchText:
だが──
少しは立ち戻れたのではないか？

engChrName: You looked to the future when you were training under me. More than you do now, at least.
engSearchText:
You looked to the future when you were training
under me. More than you do now, at least.
jpnChrName: 私の元で修行していた時代の、 今よりもまだ前を向けていたおぬしに。
jpnSearchText:
私の元で修行していた時代の、
今よりもまだ前を向けていたおぬしに。

engChrName: Well...I'll admit, it did take me back.
engSearchText: Well...I'll admit, it did take me back.
jpnChrName: ……ハハ…… 少し懐かしかったのは確かです。
jpnSearchText:
……ハハ……
少し懐かしかったのは確かです。

engChrName: You taught me to be calm and one in spirit with the land and the Kunlun Mountains—to find a way forward using the energies coursing through us.
engSearchText:
You taught me to be calm and one in spirit with the
land and the Kunlun Mountains—to find a way
forward using the energies coursing through us.
jpnChrName: 悠然と構え、大地と、崑崙の山々と一体となり 流れ込む活力の中に自らの“標（しるべ）”を見出す──
jpnSearchText:
悠然と構え、大地と、崑崙の山々と一体となり
流れ込む活力の中に自らの“標（しるべ）”を見出す──

engChrName: Those teachings are more relevant than ever now that I'm working with so many others who aren't so sure where they belong.
engSearchText:
Those teachings are more relevant than ever now that
I'm working with so many others who aren't so sure
where they belong.
jpnChrName: その教えが今の俺の在り方に繋がっている── 狭間で迷う者達と向き合うようになった、今と。
jpnSearchText:
その教えが今の俺の在り方に繋がっている──
狭間で迷う者達と向き合うようになった、今と。

engChrName: Indeed—and I hope you'll always keep that in your heart.
engSearchText:
Indeed—and I hope you'll always keep that in
your heart.
jpnChrName: ゆめ、忘れぬようにすることだ。
jpnSearchText: ゆめ、忘れぬようにすることだ。

engChrName: Remember what you have created throughout the life you have chosen, and what is truly capable of binding you.
engSearchText:
Remember what you have created throughout the life
you have chosen, and what is truly capable of
binding you.
jpnChrName: 己が選び取った道の先で築いてきたものを、 己を真に縛り得るものが何なのかを。
jpnSearchText:
己が選び取った道の先で築いてきたものを、
己を真に縛り得るものが何なのかを。

engChrName: Only you can face your demons, but I'll do all I can to aid you.
engSearchText:
Only you can face your demons, but I'll do all I can to
aid you.
jpnChrName: 向き合えるのはおぬし自身── だが私も力になることは惜しむまい。
jpnSearchText:
向き合えるのはおぬし自身──
だが私も力になることは惜しむまい。

engChrName: For you will always be my student, and I will always be proud of you.
engSearchText:
For you will always be my student, and I will always
be proud of you.
jpnChrName: 我が誇り高き弟子の一人のことならばな。
jpnSearchText: 我が誇り高き弟子の一人のことならばな。

engChrName: ...I'll do my best to keep that in mind.
engSearchText: ...I'll do my best to keep that in mind.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、肝に銘じますよ。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、肝に銘じますよ。

engChrName: Thank you very much, Master Barkhorn.
engSearchText: Thank you very much, Master Barkhorn.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございました、 バルクホルン師父。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございました、
バルクホルン師父。

engChrName: Heh. Then let us return to the city.
engSearchText: Heh. Then let us return to the city.
jpnChrName: フフ…… では、ともに戻るとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
では、ともに戻るとしようか。

engChrName: I ought to be able to enjoy the journey back with my student much more now that the matter has been dealt with.
engSearchText:
I ought to be able to enjoy the journey back with my
student much more now that the matter has been
dealt with.
jpnChrName: 今度は心置きなく、 師弟で夜風を楽しめそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
今度は心置きなく、
師弟で夜風を楽しめそうだからな。

engChrName: That's our master, all right. So he's just as good to his unofficial student, too, then?
engSearchText:
That's our master, all right. So he's just as good to his
unofficial student, too, then?
jpnChrName: ったく、先生らしいぜ…… “裏弟子”にもあんな感じなのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、先生らしいぜ……
“裏弟子”にもあんな感じなのかよ。

engChrName: I'm not at all surprised. That's simply his way—once he makes up his mind to guide someone, he will never turn his back on them.
engSearchText:
I'm not at all surprised. That's simply his way—once
he makes up his mind to guide someone, he will never
turn his back on them.
jpnChrName: それがあの方ですから。 導くと決めたら、どこまでも向き合う……
jpnSearchText:
それがあの方ですから。
導くと決めたら、どこまでも向き合う……

engChrName: Well, he did a decent enough job in Oración, so let's hope we can count on him at least a little in the future.
engSearchText:
Well, he did a decent enough job in Oración, so let's
hope we can count on him at least a little in
the future.
jpnChrName: ま、オラシオンでの働きもあるし 今後も少しは根性見せてくれんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、オラシオンでの働きもあるし
今後も少しは根性見せてくれんだろ。

engChrName: Only time will tell if that is truly the case.
engSearchText: Only time will tell if that is truly the case.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、この先は彼次第でしょうがね。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、この先は彼次第でしょうがね。

engChrName: Together, Van and Bergard made their way back to the capital, enjoying the cool, peaceful night breeze as they did so.
engSearchText:
Together, Van and Bergard made their way back to
the capital, enjoying the cool, peaceful night breeze as
they did so.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンとベルガルドは 穏やかな夜の風を感じながら首都に戻り……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンとベルガルドは
穏やかな夜の風を感じながら首都に戻り……

engChrName: They then resumed their respective tasks upon returning to Edith.
engSearchText:
They then resumed their respective tasks upon
returning to Edith.
jpnChrName: 改めてそれぞれ行動を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>改めてそれぞれ行動を再開したのだった。

engChrName: You're right on time.
engSearchText: You're right on time.
jpnChrName: ──君か、時間通りだな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>──君か、時間通りだな。

engChrName: I just came out onto the highway.
engSearchText: I just came out onto the highway.
jpnChrName: ちょうど国道へ出たところです。
jpnSearchText: ちょうど国道へ出たところです。

engChrName: Thanks to your help, I was able to get through the checkpoint without issue.
engSearchText:
Thanks to your help, I was able to get through the
checkpoint without issue.
jpnChrName: お陰様で、検問は問題なくスルーできました。
jpnSearchText: お陰様で、検問は問題なくスルーできました。

engChrName: There's a lot less traffic on the roads than usual, so I expect I'll reach you a little ahead of schedule.
engSearchText:
There's a lot less traffic on the roads than usual, so I
expect I'll reach you a little ahead of schedule.
jpnChrName: いつも以上に車が少ないですし、 そちらへの到着はやや早まりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
いつも以上に車が少ないですし、
そちらへの到着はやや早まりそうです。

engChrName: Excellent. I will be waiting.
engSearchText: Excellent. I will be waiting.
jpnChrName: 承知した。 現地で待っている。
jpnSearchText:
承知した。
現地で待っている。

engChrName: I wasn't sure if you would be able to oblige our request, so I am pleased you have been able to.
engSearchText:
I wasn't sure if you would be able to oblige our
request, so I am pleased you have been able to.
jpnChrName: この状況下で依頼に応えてくれるか、 多少懸念はあったがな。
jpnSearchText:
この状況下で依頼に応えてくれるか、
多少懸念はあったがな。

engChrName: I'm well aware you're against the clock. Saying no was never an option.
engSearchText:
I'm well aware you're against the clock. Saying no was
never an option.
jpnChrName: そちらも時間はあまりない── 足を止めるわけにはいかないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そちらも時間はあまりない──
足を止めるわけにはいかないでしょう。

engChrName: Especially since I'm connected to this project, too. I'll make sure these parts are delivered—I swear it on my name as a courier.
engSearchText:
Especially since I'm connected to this project, too.
I'll make sure these parts are delivered—I swear it on
my name as a courier.
jpnChrName: 品物は必ず届けます、運び屋の名に懸けて── プロジェクトの関係者としても。
jpnSearchText:
品物は必ず届けます、運び屋の名に懸けて──
プロジェクトの関係者としても。

engChrName: I'm sure you will. I trust in your abilities.
engSearchText: I'm sure you will. I trust in your abilities.
jpnChrName: 君の腕は信頼している。
jpnSearchText: <C1>君の腕は信頼している。

engChrName: As long as the parts arrive safely, I have no specific instructions on how you deliver them.
engSearchText:
As long as the parts arrive safely, I have no specific
instructions on how you deliver them.
jpnChrName: 部品（それ）が無事に届きさえすれば さして細かい指示は無い。
jpnSearchText:
部品（それ）が無事に届きさえすれば
さして細かい指示は無い。

engChrName: I'm counting on you. Contact me again once you arrive.
engSearchText:
I'm counting on you. Contact me again once
you arrive.
jpnChrName: では、よろしく頼む。 現地に着いたらまた連絡を。
jpnSearchText:
では、よろしく頼む。
現地に着いたらまた連絡を。

engChrName: Understood, Professor Cronkite.
engSearchText: Understood, Professor Cronkite.
jpnChrName: 了解です──クロンカイト教授。
jpnSearchText: 了解です──<w1000>クロンカイト教授。
